title: Hallowed Sepulchre

properties.name: description
properties.value: • Assumes the player is looting all chests on floors 4 and 5, using Lvl-3 Enchant, mahogany planks, and a hallowed hammer, hallowed focus, and hallowed symbol. Looting all chests on floors 4 and 5 requires near click-perfect execution and all mentioned hallowed items. If the player is still learning floor 5 or is not yet click perfect, a hallowed token (worth 10 hallowed marks) can be used to grant 1 extra minute of time. This will decrease profitability by 8,337 per token (likely one per run).

content:
Completing The Hallowed Sepulchre
Requirements
Skills
  • Sins of the Father quest requirements
  • 92 to allow access to floor 5
  • 66 , 54 , 56 , 62 to complete skill challenges and loot coffins
Items
  • Full graceful, vampyre dust, a crossbow, mith grapple, planks/nails,
  • runes for an enchant spell, hammer, saw, strange old lockpick or a normal lockpick,
  • prayer book or antipoison, stamina potion. Recommended to have purchased the hallowed grapple, hallowed hammer,
  • hallowed focus, and hallowed symbol from the shop.
    • Quest
    Sins of the Father, optionally The Great Brain Robbery to use the prayer book.
    Other
    Patience when learning the floors
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    2,708,806 75,000 7,200 1,200 1,800 6,300
    Inputs (89,043)Outputs (2,797,849)
    18 × Mahogany plank (38,934)45 × Rune nails (37,350)6 × Vampyre dust (3,780)1.5 × Stamina potion(4) (8,979)198 × Hallowed mark (165,081)0.03 × Ring of endurance (uncharged) (1,266,084)0.65 × Strange old lockpick (full) (55,343)1.08 × Adamant 2h sword (3,775)1.08 × Adamant platebody (10,281)86.4 × Cosmic rune (8,122)86.4 × Death rune (16,070)86.4 × Nature rune (14,688)135 × Adamant bolts (26,595)14.64 × Monkfish (5,534)1.08 × Prayer potion(4) (10,871)1.62 × Ranarr weed (12,126)77,100 × Coins (77,100)3.12 × Rune 2h sword (117,964)3.12 × Rune platebody (120,235)624 × Law rune (81,744)624 × Blood rune (197,808)624 × Soul rune (94,224)624 × Runite bolts (130,416)4.68 × Sanfew serum(4) (180,086)4.68 × Ranarr seed (203,702)

    • Assumes the player is looting all chests on floors 4 and 5, using Lvl-3 Enchant, mahogany planks, and a hallowed hammer, hallowed focus, and hallowed symbol. Looting all chests on floors 4 and 5 requires near click-perfect execution and all mentioned hallowed items. If the player is still learning floor 5 or is not yet click perfect, a hallowed token (worth 10 hallowed marks) can be used to grant 1 extra minute of time. This will decrease profitability by 8,337 per token (likely one per run).

    The Hallowed Sepulchre is a solo Agility activity in Darkmeyer in which the player avoids obstacles to reach the Grand Hallowed Coffin and loot other coffins before time runs out. The activity becomes highly profitable at 92 agility, as this allows players to loot floor 5, where the ring of endurance can be obtained. Due to the high proportion of profit allocated to the ring drop, actual profit will be influenced largely by player luck. Other notable frequent high-value drops are ranarr seeds, sanfew serums, runite bolts, and blood runes.

    • Once comfortable with the final floors a hallowed token can be used to ensure the player can loot all chests on floors 2 and 3 in addition to 4 and 5. It is recommended to bring three vampyre dust per run and 6 mahogany planks. If click perfect, this can be achieved without a hallowed token.

    • Looting all chests from floors 2-5 (including the Grand Hallowed Coffin) without a token will yield an average of 428,444 per run including the Ring of endurance and 217,430 without the Ring of endurance. This is compared against an average of 398,012 per run including the Ring of endurance and 186,998 without the Ring of endurance for completing just floors 4 and 5 [an increase of 30,432/run or approximately 182,592/hr at 6 laps per hour].

    Note that if the player is planning on training Construction using mahogany planks normally, it is recommended to continue using them here as the gp/xp of using the planks to repair bridges is superior to using them normally.

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
